message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper proposes a new computational framework for synthesizing photo-realistic food meal images from textual lists of ingredients. This involves the use of generative deep models and attention-based ingredients-image association models. Given the focus on image synthesis and deep learning, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). However, since the paper also involves natural language processing (NLP) and generative models, it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). Other possible sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.GR (Graphics).
